name: Snow Fight 2D
description: Brave the winter storm in this retro-inspired 2D top-down shooter. You play as a lone survivor, fending off hordes of relentless snowmen enemies. Navigate through the icy landscapes using your trusty weapons, blasting your way through the snowmen as they relentlessly pursue you. Collect power-ups and upgrades to become stronger and take on even more challenging snowmen. Can you survive the winter and save humanity from this frosty invasion?
